describe: Spain, located in Southwestern Europe, is known for its rich history, diverse culture, and vibrant cities. It boasts stunning architecture, beautiful beaches, and a variety of landscapes ranging from mountains to plains.

cities.name: 🏝 Barcelona
cities.geographical_location: Northeastern Spain, on the Mediterranean coast
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with mild, humid winters and warm, dry summers

cities.name: 🌳 Madrid
cities.climate: Continental climate with hot summers and cold winters
cities.famous_cuisine: Cocido Madrileño, Bocadillo de Calamares, Churros

cities.name: 🌆 Seville
cities.geographical_location: Southern Spain, in the region of Andalusia
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with very hot summers and mild winters

cities.name: 🏝 Valencia
cities.geographical_location: Eastern Spain, on the Mediterranean coast
cities.climate: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and hot, dry summers

cities.name: 🌆 Bilbao
cities.geographical_location: Northern Spain, in the Basque Country
cities.climate: Oceanic climate with mild temperatures and frequent rainfall
cities.famous_cuisine: Pintxos, Bacalao a la Vizcaína, Txakoli
